shortdesc.ph: Codec profile for video in CDN streaming.
Codec profile for video in relay streaming output.
Codec profile for video in CDN streaming.
Codec profile type for video output in relayed streaming.

plentry.pd: 66: Baseline level video codec profile, typically used in low-end or error-tolerant applications such as video calls and mobile videos.
77: Main level video codec profile, typically used in mainstream consumer electronics such as MP4, portable video players, PSP, iPad, etc.
100: (Default) High level video codec profile, typically used in broadcasting, video disc storage, and HDTV.
66: Baseline profile, typically used in low-end or error-tolerant applications such as video calls, mobile videos, etc.
77: Main profile, typically used in mainstream consumer electronics such as MP4, portable video players, PSP, iPad, etc.
100: (Default) High profile, typically used in broadcasting, video disc storage, and HDTV.

77: Main profile, generally used in mainstream consumer electronics such as MP4 players, portable video players, PSP, iPad, etc.
100: (Default) High profile, generally used for broadcasting, video disc storage, and HDTV.
66: Baseline profile, typically used for lower-end or error-resilient applications such as video calls and mobile videos.
77: Main profile, typically used in mainstream consumer electronics such as MP4, portable video players, PSP, iPad, etc.
100: (Default) High profile, typically used in broadcasting, video disc storage, and HDTV.
